product.highSugarExplanation: Sugar exceeds recommended threshold per 100 g (>13.5 g for food, >6.75 g for drinks)
product.highSaltExplanation: Salt exceeds 1.5 g per 100 g ‚Äî UK FSA high-salt threshold

landing.description: Search, scan, and compare food products across Poland and Germany. Get instant health scores, allergen warnings, and better alternatives.
landing.featureSearchDesc: Find products by name, brand, or category
landing.featureScanDesc: Scan barcodes for instant product info
landing.featureCompareDesc: See health scores and find better alternatives

legal.contactIntro: Have questions, feedback, or want to report a data issue? Reach out to us.
legal.dataWeCollectText: We collect your email address for authentication, your food preferences and allergen settings, and anonymous usage analytics. We do not sell your data or share it with third parties.
legal.howWeUseText: Your data is used to provide personalized food recommendations, allergen warnings, and health scores. Preferences are stored securely in our database and synced across your devices.
legal.dataStorageText: All data is stored on Supabase (PostgreSQL) hosted in the EU. We use row-level security to ensure you can only access your own data.
legal.yourRightsText: Under GDPR, you have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. Contact us at the email below to exercise these rights.
legal.acceptanceText: By using Poland Food DB, you agree to these terms. If you do not agree, please do not use the service.
legal.serviceDescText: Poland Food DB provides food product information, health scores, and nutritional data sourced from Open Food Facts and our own analysis. This is for informational purposes only and does not constitute medical or dietary advice.
legal.dataAccuracyText: While we strive for accuracy, food data may contain errors. Always check product labels for allergen and nutritional information. We are not liable for decisions made based on our data.
legal.userAccountsText: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account. Do not share your credentials. We reserve the right to suspend accounts that violate these terms.
legal.liabilityText: Poland Food DB is provided "as is" without warranties. We are not liable for any damages arising from the use of this service.
legal.contactText: For questions about these terms, contact us at:

onboarding.regionSubtitle: We'll show you products available in your country.
onboarding.dietarySubtitle: Optional ‚Äî helps filter products to match your diet. You can change these later in Settings.
